name: @danscan/sqlite3-parser
description: WebAssembly-compiled SQL parser for SQLite dialect with TypeScript support

scripts.build:wasm: cd rust && wasm-pack build --target web --release --out-dir pkg
scripts.build:wasm:debug: cd rust && wasm-pack build --target web --release --out-dir pkg --features debug
scripts.build:ts: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --external rust/pkg/sqlparser_wasm.js && bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format cjs --outfile index.js --external rust/pkg/sqlparser_wasm.js
scripts.build: bun run build:wasm && bun run build:ts && bun run build:types
scripts.dev: cd rust && wasm-pack build --target web --dev --out-dir pkg
scripts.release: cd rust && wasm-pack build --target web --release --out-dir pkg
